snippet.title: Grimlord - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Grimlord is a RPG dark fantasy VR game where players will use a variety of weapons and armaments to slay any enemies in your way. With full customization and move sets without limit, players will be able to wield powerful spells to assist them on their journey. Grimlord is launching in Steam Early Access on June 22 for Meta Quest and launching soon on Pico, YVR, and PlayStation VR2.

#GameTrailers #VR #SummerofGaming
